channel.title: D-claw spicial hit

item.title: D-claw spicial hit
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

[quote=“ledgman, post:8, topic:279117”]That don’t work sometimes.

[code]
public boolean process() {
add this

if(dclaws == 3) {
dclawed();
}

if(dclaws == 2) {
startAnimation(2068);
dclawed2();
}

if(dclaws == 1) {
dclawed2();
actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2;
}

if(dclaws > 0) {
dclaws -= 1;
}

Also search for public boolean process only.[/code][/quote]
yes,this ALWAYS WORKS on delta

Read full topic

item.title: D-claw spicial hit
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

[code]first
under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
add

[code]
public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;
next add this above

[code]
public int GetWepAnim(int id)

public int dclaws = 0;

public void dclawed2() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed2);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}
public void dclawed() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}

next
search for

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ then under the }
add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){
dclaws = 3;
getHit(65);
usingSpecial = true;
}

next under

[code]
public boolean process() {
add this

if(dclaws == 3) {
dclawed();
}

if(dclaws == 2) {
startAnimation(2068);
dclawed2();
}

if(dclaws == 1) {
dclawed2();
actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2;
}

if(dclaws > 0) {
dclaws -= 1;
}

under that add

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}

then find

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
npcDamage(8);
}[/code]
add this under

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8050 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Lastly in special.java add

case 8050:

under

case 5698:

Make sure u do that 2 times!!! in special.java
Make sure you change all 8050 to 8002 or whatever your dragon claw ID is.[/code][/code][/code][/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2009, 11:02:19 am[/size][hr]phew , thats it if u got questions ask me.

Read full topic

item.title: D-claw spicial hit
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

Search for this

 public boolean process() {

Then add this underneath this to make your dragon claws hit 4x

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
